Key Match Events: The Memphis Grizzlies took home the victory with a final score of 131-114.
Ja Morant pulled an and-1 on Gabe Vincent and taunted with a 'too small' gesture.
LeBron James taunted Ja Morant back after Morant hit the ground.
Ja Morant was sidelined for the remainder of the second half after injuring his hamstring during a failed alley-oop attempt.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant clapped back at the Lakers' photo on social media, which went viral with over 570,000 views on X.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rivalry between the Memphis Grizzlies and Los Angeles Lakers continues to grow.
The Grizzlies and the Lakers will meet again on November 13.
